title: WHY DID MY ACCOUNT GOT SUSPENDED?
body:
I was toxic because my team dont gank me and i ask them nicely but no one reply and i got angry so i rage at them and they reported me and i got 14 day suspended and when i login the day of the suspended didnt even change its already 2 days and its still 14 day suspended wtf?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: if so you have another 12 days to go, if it still isn't gone by then send in a ticket. You also answered your own question, you were toxic.
No, the timer doesn't count down, It shows the date you were suspended and for how long, there is no timer
Junglers DONT have to gnak you, it would be nice, but they dont have too.
Junglers can AFK farm the whole game and you can't report them cause they ain't doing nothing wrong, there is nothing in the rules that say Junglers MUST gank either
AND DID I GET PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED? cuz i didnt see any  PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED on the thing.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
AND AND AND MY DARK VISCOUNT ACCOUNT GOT HACKED WHEN I GOT JUST GOT SUSPENDED WOOOOOOOOOOOW
You're either a very unintelligent human being or a very young child, either way, uninstall the game.
You sound a little young to be playing League tbh lol
